Actions.Text: REPORTED AND COMMITTED TO INTERNET AND TECHNOLOGY

Title: Relates to the use of algorithmic pricing by landlords for the purpose of determining the amount of rent to charge a residential tenant
Summary: Prohibits a person or entity from knowingly or with reckless disregard facilitate an agreement between or among two or more residential rental property owners or managers to not compete with respect to residential rental dwelling units, including by operating or licensing a software, data analytics service, or algorithmic device that performs a coordinating function on behalf of or between and among such residential rental property owners or managers.
LawCode: Add ยง340-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the use of algorithmic pricing by a landlord for the purpose of determining the amount of rent to charge a residential tenant
